author: Prakash Kamat
text:
Pop star Remo Fernandes on Thursday moved the Goa Children’s Court, seeking anticipatory bail in a case related to verbally abusing a teenage girl. The hearing has been fixed for Friday.

The singer is facing an FIR for allegedly verbally abusing a 17-year-old girl from Malvan in Maharashtra who was knocked down by a car driven by his son Jonah in north Goa on December 2. Mr. Fernandes was also travelling in the car.
title: Remo moves court for anticipatory bail
